roleset.name: in the margin, almost not making a cut-off
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8, comparison to low.01. Semi-relation to marginalize.01.

example.name: arg3
example.text: non-Annex B participation in emissions reduction is marginal, at 7 per cent of the total carbon mitigation.

at 7 per cent of the total carbon mitigation

example.name: arg1
example.text: BP has been marginal over night , but did not require pressors .

example.name: both args
example.text: I-1 like playing chess and while would only profess *PRO*-1 to be marginal at playing it, I'm always willing to improve... and move my pieces differently.
